Uses of ExtendedLine in display
 

Methods in display with parameters of type ExtendedLine
 void GraphWithAnimLine.init(int[] xs, int[] ys, boolean[] cs, ExtendedLine l, LineAnimator a)
          Initialise the graph and begin the animation after 5 seconds.
If the graph has already been initialised, this will reset it, discarding the previous data and line and halting the animator.
